=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 18, col = 18)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 18, col = 18)

Since the avatar's position has not changed from the last state, I need to reevaluate the environment and make a meaningful action. Currently, the avatar is at (18, 18), which is on the same level as a firehole (%), and it appears that there are no immediate collectibles or safe moves available without potentially incurring damage.

The next objectives are to find a safe route to either collect items or move toward the exit door located at (1, 20), while avoiding hazards such as the firehole.

Given the absence of any movement in the last state, I will first attempt to rotate my avatar to the upward direction to explore the only nearby collectible item to the north at (17, 18), which is not hazardous.

Let's perform the upward action:

``` Action:4 ``` 

This expectedly helps the avatar move up, potentially getting closer to avoiding the firehole and discovering new items.
